Review Title: In the Light of the Pen the dream comes true
Review Text:
The welcome is the warmest I have ever had.We go out of our way to please you 
The quality of the food and its cooking deserves a 3 star rating 
The hotel is a family home with crazy charm and the location in the center of the village is perfect with free parking next door

A beautiful weekend in this beautiful house full of charm, at the foot of the beautiful village of Grignan. The garden is beautiful, the rooms welcoming and the breakfast superb. Thank you to the team for its kindness and professionalism.

Review Text: Pension very good, super comfortable, very nice staff, beautiful garden, when in the restaurant the impeccable staff, smiling, with little care, cooking a real delight you should not be afraid to be surprised. I'll never forget the surprise for my birthday. Thank you to the 3 Chefs and all the staff.

🌟 An unforgettable experience in Grignan! 🌟

Today I had the pleasure of having lunch at the Clair de la Plume table, and I must say that the chef is simply fabulous! 

Jean-Luc, the property owner, shared this exceptional moment with us, and had discovered his entire menu.

We had the chance to share this moment with Tomas Feier co-president of the Tourist Office of Grignan and Owner of the Bastide of Grignan. Quil was able to transform with the help of Christopher, and this is felt in every detail.

What a pleasure to see so much energy deployed for their territory! Their commitment to promoting local know-how and understanding the social and societal impacts of Things to do is truly inspiring. 

Many thanks to the whole team for this memorable moment! 🍽️✨ #Grignan #Gastronomy #LocalKnow-How #SustainableTourism

I had a real crush on Le clair de plume! It is a beautiful place 
Located in the center of Grignan
Michelin-starred restaurant on site 
Two superb swimming pools available 
Decorated with elegance!
Excellent welcome 

We'll be back!

Sublime! A luxurious break out of time.
A great budget for the Malyse suite, admittedly, but we were received like kings! Superb suite in an old house in the heart of Grignan, very appreciated attention for our children, and lovely staff.
Bravo!!

Review Text: This hotel in the charming village of Grignan is actually my favourite hotel in the world. I've been coming here for years, and each time the experience gets better and better.  The original hotel with it's elegant rooms and beautiful gardens make you feel transported to another world, and the new addition and renovation of the old farmhouse Chapouton which is only a few minutes walk is another creation extraordinaire! The two restaurants - the Bistro (SO great!) and the Michelin star restaurant  (Which is beyond AMAZING and should definitely be on your bucket list!!) is only surpassed by the hotel staff. They are so kind and professional and always there to make sure your experience is one to remember. So many hotels strive for excellence, but this one truly delivers, and I look forward to next year's visit!! A very happy customer, Barbara (United Kingdom)

Review Title: Very nice stopover restaurant and hotel
Review Text:
A very, very beautiful discovery in a truly authentic village. Without the Michelin guide we would never have discovered this place!
Very warm welcome. An efficient and friendly service. A remarkable one-star restaurant worth two! A leader to follow!
Thank you, go there without hesitation!

Review Text: Excellent weekend in this wonderful 4-star hotel....From reservation to departure, everything was perfect, smiling and professional staff. Breakfast, nothing but happiness. Quality products. We did not have dinner at the gourmet restaurant, but at the bistro.We will come back without hesitation.Superb junior suite room...Thank you again.

Review Title: A haven of peace and charm for this establishment at the entrance to the typical village of Drôme, Gruignan…
Review Text:
An astonishing place of finesse and a sober and classic aesthetic without ostentation…
Teams like teams are perfect…
We feel at home in just a few moments…
Excellent value for money and does not pulp the gastrointestinal tract!
Room with incredible terrace!

Review Title: Amazing hotel in a lovely village
Review Text: Amazing hotel, located in a lovely village this hotel is perfect. It's very beautiful, the rooms are very big and very well decorated. The staff is so helpful and nice, the main house is gorgeous...we wish we could spend more time at this hotel,  it's a real luxe. We will return.

An exceptional place, great calm and ideal location. An idyllic setting, very professional and friendly staff. Beautiful spaces, beautiful equipment and high quality buffet breakfast.
To recommend ! And we already really want to come back.

An extraordinary, memorable experience, tastefully decorated room, in the center of this delightful village. Restaurant at the farm bistro in a magnificent setting with a view of the castle. Amazing breakfast in the unique setting of the main house. At €25 it’s very good value for money. Hats off to all the staff who have a love of service. Of course we will come back.

We booked a room for a relaxing weekend, and everything was perfect. An establishment where you feel at ease, the staff are welcoming, kind, helpful, the room is very good, pleasant and comfortable, everything is there.
Then comes the restaurant, an excellent meal, from start to finish, just a treat.
Finesse and simplicity, worked, a marvel.
The next day at noon we had lunch at la Ferme, and again everything was perfect.
Nothing to say except: we will come back.
Thanks to the whole team for a moment like I haven't had in a long time.
Another superb weekend in this hotel. Very comfortable rooms, competent and very kind staff, an exceptional breakfast... we were even treated to lots of little touches... we will come back again!!!

Exceptional location
Jean-Luc and his team have made this building a true gem. The atmosphere reflects the owner's image: welcoming, warm, peaceful, perfect for getting away from it all, and impeccably clean. The staff is available, welcoming, and smiling. The house is comfortable where you feel good, plus a wonderful culinary discovery. A bubble of well-being that we recommend without moderation.

Rooms more beautiful in reality than on the site. Please note: the church bell tower rings the hours from 7 a.m. until 9 p.m. Quality breakfast. Excellent bedding. Perfectly blackout windows. Little touches with nougats on the pillows and still and sparkling water.
FYI, the Virgile suite has a spa bath and a charming little living room with TV where 2 people can sleep (mostly children). Some rooms have access from the outside: small stone stairs. Tuesday is a market day so you should plan to park far from the hotel opposite the village hall.
“Excellent” rating for the restaurant La Ferme de Chapouton. Quality and price are there! A delicious discovery. To do again…

Reviews are always welcome to guide us on our choices when looking for unusual places that meet our requests.

The first word I could give is lunar because it was an experience outside of time in weightlessness in this magnificent setting where the magic worked because all the people who welcomed us made sure that our stay was exceptional.

On Saturday evening when we arrived for the night we were in the hotel which is a very well maintained architectural building of character.
The private Chanoine room where we slept was comfortable, very good bedding and tasteful decoration.

The staff is quality, and intentional through their service and remains attentive and available with a breakfast which brightened our morning nothing to complain about just thank them.

Saturday evening: let's talk about the restaurant La Ferme du Chapouton, in continuation of the service received by the hotel the welcome was impeccable as well as the service, but let's talk about the culinary part being a fine gastronomic critic I discovered a culinary journey including the emotions still remain anchored on my taste buds hats off to the cooked.

On Sunday lunchtime we went to the winegrowers' café, this summer I find nice but a little more in a classic standard than the rest of the previous services even if we were well received and well eaten and a good wine tasting but that does not correspond no personal opinion on the services received in the two descriptions above concerning the hotel and the restaurant of the Chapouton farm.

We will definitely come back, best regards Mr Rousselet

Without the gift from a friend “Les Collectors”, we probably would not have discovered this magical place less than an hour from home.
Yes, the lively and historic village of Grignan is charming, yes the place (by the light of the pen) its suite, its breakfast, its rooms are welcoming, yes its staff takes great care, yes the meal at the Bistrot de la ferme chapouton is masterful...
In short, nothing to say, or rather nothing to complain about, except that we will come back.
THANKS

We spent one night, a gourmet meal and breakfast
We looked for the fault but we never found it
Delicious and very tasty dinner, very pleasant rooms, haven of peace in this pretty village of Grignan
Excellent times with friends, very good breakfast, very pleasant room
We will return with great pleasure
Bravo to the chef and the very pleasant staff

There are establishments that we do not forget, this is one of them. It's hard not to be satisfied by the atmosphere, the charm of the rooms, the location... the breakfast is simply divine. We promised ourselves we would come back.

Review Title: Beautiful suite at the Clame with impeccable service and staff
Review Text:
We had booked a suite in one of the houses and stayed in the main house in a superb suite. Fruit and water on arrival in the impeccably clean and tastefully decorated room. Possibility to unload your luggage and then park the car in private parking. Evening room service. Swimming pools a little far from the hotel. Nice natural swimming pool but too many mosquitoes with pretty gardens. Swimming pool dubresyaurznt heated but quite cramped. Towels available. Fresh fruit every day in the room.
The only downside would be the breakfast charged at 25 euros which does not offer fried eggs but only scrambled eggs. That's a bit of an exaggeration.
Very pleasant and attentive staff
Very nice hotel at a high price, pleasant for 2 to 3 days.

Very comfortable bedding, very nice suite, warm welcome, no matter how hard I look I can't see anything negative. The two restaurants associated with the hotel (the Bistro de la Ferme Chapouton and the Cave des Vignerons are also excellent

We went there for our wedding anniversary. Very warm welcome, a superb room. We had booked a dinner at the gourmet restaurant, everything was perfect.
We have been to both swimming pools which are very good. In short, an unforgettable stay

Review Title: Quality experience in a charming hotel
Review Text: Magnificent hotel, full of charm. Very well located in Grignan in the old town. Electric vehicle socket. Pleasant welcome. Spacious, neat suite. Excellent breakfast with quality products and champagne taken on a magnificent terrace with old trees. Professional staff.
